page.title: 09MRS. DUFFY'S DAY
page.content: 12.00 buy a salad cob at Loughborough and eat walking about 12.30 went to a supermarket to shop 1.30 came home and unloaded the car.1.45 have coffee and read the post.Take the washing out of the machine and hang on the line.2.00 put ponies out on grass for an hour. 2.15 do some ironing and bring washing in.3.00 bring ponies in to the stable, then go to Keyworth to get some horse food and petrol.3.45 went over to see her horse to prepare him for her lesson later.4.15 put tack in the horse truck then we all had our tea early because of our horse lesson.6.30 we put the horses in the truck and went to Rearsby and at 7.10.we arrive and work in the ponies for our 7.30 lesson.At 8.30.we have finished our lesson and go home.We put them in the field or stable.Mummy watches television and goes to bed at 10.30pm.
